label: Indicator
description: The indicator capability gives you the ability to set the indicator LED light on a Z-Wave switch. As such, the most common use case for the indicator capability is in a Device Handler.

indicatorStatus.label: indicator status
indicatorStatus.description: A value representing the current state of the indicator LED

indicatorNever.description: Set the indicator LED to be always off

indicatorWhenOn.description: Set the indicator LED to on when the switch is on

indicatorWhenOff.description: Set the indicator LED to off when the switch is on
